body.section: Hierarchy PublicHealthJurisdiction is a kind of Jurisdiction

section.title: Description
section.p: Jurisdiction: "a) power; authority; control; b) the territory over which authority is exercised" - Dictionary.com

This class represents an organization that is responsible for Public Health either at the local, state, or national level. This organization has, among other powers, the authority to compel the reporting of medical information by healthcare providers within its territory.
